creator: Payward, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Kraken is the easy, safe and secure way to buy and sell bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies, now available in a simple, on-the-go app for trading and managing your account.

At the forefront of the Bitcoin revolution since 2011, Kraken is one of the largest and oldest Bitcoin exchanges in the world. We are consistently named one of the best and most secure places to buy and sell crypto online.

Whether you’re a crypto-beginner or an advanced trader, Kraken gives you the power to chart your own financial course, thanks to our excellent service, handy tools, low fees, versatile funding options and rigorous security standards.

THE BEST TRADING EXPERIENCE
Easily buy and sell the most popular cryptocurrencies
No trading fees for buy/sell orders created in the app
Know the exact price before you buy/sell
24/7 support with a single tap to open a support ticket

BUY & SELL
Scroll and tap to select the asset to buy/sell
Preset amounts to create orders in a single tap
Simple form for custom orders
Get an exact price quote before you trade
Review your orders and past trades
See your available balance for trading

TRACK YOUR PORTFOLIO
Simple graphic showing your investment allocation and total balance
Easily review the value of each investment and its % of your portfolio
Quickly adjust your portfolio with a tap to buy or sell
Review transaction history for each investment

MARKET OVERVIEW
Asset overview pages with price, volume, charts and other details
Quickly switch between 5 chart time-frames (24 hours up to the entire price history of the asset)
Concise summary of the project behind each cryptocurrency
Leaderboard showing top gaining, top losing, most traded, largest market cap
Create your own custom list to watch your favorite assets and trade straight from the list

SIGN UP & FUND
Create, verify and fund a new account right from the app
Fund with fiat (USD, EUR, etc.)
Credit and debit cards supported
Wire and SEPA transfers

DEVICE SECURITY
If your mobile device is lost or stolen, you can revoke its access from your account
Opening the app requires the same security as opening your device (password or biometric)
Hide balances from displaying on your device
Quickly review a list of devices that have accessed the account (make sure it’s only you!)

AVAILABLE CRYPTOCURRENCIES
We have one of the largest selections of assets to buy, sell and trade, including:

Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Litecoin (LTC), Tether (USDT), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Monero (XMR), Dash (DASH), Chainlink (LINK), EOS (EOS), Tezos (XTZ), Zcash (ZEC), Cardano (ADA), Gnosis (GNO), Dai (DAI), Augur (REP), OMG Network (OMG), PAX Gold (PAXG), Polkadot (DOT), and many more!

title: Kraken - Buy Bitcoin & Crypto

creator: Payward, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Kraken is the easy, safe and secure way to buy and sell bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies, now available in a simple, on-the-go app for investing and managing your account.

At the forefront of the Bitcoin revolution since 2011, Kraken is one of the largest and oldest Bitcoin exchanges in the world. Millions of clients around the world trust Kraken to buy and sell cryptocurrencies.

Whether you’re a crypto-beginner or an advanced trader, Kraken gives you the power to chart your own financial course, thanks to our excellent service, handy tools, low fees, versatile funding options and rigorous security standards.

THE BEST INVESTING EXPERIENCE
Easily buy and sell the most popular cryptocurrencies
Low fees for buy/sell orders
Know the exact price before you buy/sell
24/7 support with a single tap to open a support ticket

BUY & SELL
Scroll and tap to select the asset to buy/sell
Preset amounts to create orders in a single tap
Simple form for custom orders
Get an exact price quote before you buy or sell
Review your past transactions
See your available balance for buying

TRACK YOUR PORTFOLIO
Simple graphic showing your investment allocation and total balance
Easily review the value of each investment and its % of your portfolio
Quickly adjust your portfolio with a tap to buy or sell
Review transaction history for each investment

MARKET OVERVIEW
Asset overview pages with price, volume, charts and other details
Quickly switch between 5 chart time-frames (24 hours up to the entire price history of the asset)
Concise summary of the project behind each cryptocurrency
Leaderboard showing top gaining, top losing, most traded, largest market cap
Create your own custom list to watch your favorite assets and buy straight from the list

SIGN UP & FUND
Create, verify and fund a new account right from the app
Fund with cash (USD, EUR, GBP, CAD, AUD, CHF, and JPY)
Connect your bank account
Deposit and withdraw cryptocurrencies

DEVICE SECURITY
If your mobile device is lost or stolen, you can revoke its access from your account
Opening the app requires the same security as opening your device (password or biometric)
Hide balances from displaying on your device
Quickly review a list of devices that have accessed the account (make sure it’s only you!)

AVAILABLE CRYPTOCURRENCIES
We have one of the largest selections of assets to buy and sell, including:

Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Litecoin (LTC), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Monero (XMR), Dash (DASH), Chainlink (LINK), EOS, Tezos (XTZ), Zcash (ZEC), Cardano (ADA), Gnosis (GNO), Dai, Augur (REP), OMG Network (OMG), PAX Gold (PAXG), Polkadot (DOT), and many more!

title: Kraken - Buy Bitcoin & Crypto

creator: Payward, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Kraken is the easy, safe and secure way to buy crypto such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Dogecoin and more, now available in a simple, on-the-go app for investing and managing your account.

At the forefront of the Bitcoin revolution since 2011, Kraken is one of the largest and oldest Bitcoin exchanges in the world. Millions of clients around the world trust Kraken to sell, swap and buy crypto.

Whether you’re a crypto-beginner or an advanced trader, Kraken gives you the power to chart your own financial course, thanks to our excellent service, handy tools, low fees, versatile funding options and rigorous security standards.


---
CRYPTO INVESTING MADE SIMPLE
---
• Easily buy and sell the most popular cryptocurrencies
• Low fees for buy/sell orders
• Know the exact price before you buy/sell
• 24/7 support with a single tap to open a support ticket
• Multiple payment options to buy crypto including Google Pay


---
EASILY BUY & SELL CRYPTO
---
• Scroll and tap to select the asset to buy/sell
• Preset amounts to create orders in a single tap
• Simple form for custom orders
• Get an exact price quote before you buy or sell
• Review your past transactions
• See your available balance to buy crypto


---
TRACK YOUR CRYPTO PORTFOLIO
---
• Simple graphic showing your investment allocation and total balance
• Easily review the value of each investment and its % of your portfolio
• Quickly adjust your portfolio with a tap to buy crypto or sell
• Review transaction history for each investment


---
MARKET OVERVIEW & PRICES
---
• Asset overview pages with price, volume, charts and other details
• Quickly switch between 5 chart time-frames (24 hours up to the entire price history of the asset)
• Concise summary of the project behind each cryptocurrency
• Leaderboard showing top gaining, top losing, most traded, largest market cap
• Create your own custom list to watch your favorite assets and buy straight from the list

---
SIGN UP & FUND
---
• Create, verify and fund a new account right from the app
• Fund with cash (EUR, GBP, USD, CAD, AUD, CHF, and JPY)
• Deposit and withdraw cryptocurrencies
• Buy crypto in seconds with Google Pay

---
DEVICE SECURITY
---
• If your mobile device is lost or stolen, you can revoke its access from your account
• Opening the app requires the same security as opening your device (password or biometric)
• Hide balances from displaying on your device
• Quickly review a list of devices that have accessed the account (make sure it’s only you!)

---
OVER 120 CRYPTOCURRENCIES AVAILABLE
---
We have one of the largest selections of assets to buy and sell, including:

Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Dogecoin (DOGE), Litecoin (LTC), Ripple (XRP), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Monero (XMR), EOS, Cardano (ADA), Polkadot (DOT), TRON (TRX), Stellar (XLM) and many more.

Not investment advice. Crypto trading involves risk of loss.
descriptionShort: Access 24/7, industry-leading customer support. Buy crypto with confidence.

Whether you’re a crypto-beginner or an advanced trader, Kraken gives you the power to chart your own financial course, thanks to our excellent service, handy tools, low fees, versatile funding options and rigorous security standards.


---
CRYPTO INVESTING MADE SIMPLE
---
• Easily buy and sell the most popular cryptocurrencies
• Low fees for buy/sell orders
• Know the exact price before you buy/sell
• 24/7 support with a single tap to open a support ticket
• Multiple payment options to buy crypto including Google Pay


---
EASILY BUY & SELL CRYPTO
---
• Scroll and tap to select the asset to buy/sell
• Preset amounts to create orders in a single tap
• Simple form for custom orders
• Get an exact price quote before you buy or sell
• Review your past transactions
• See your available balance to buy crypto


---
TRACK YOUR CRYPTO PORTFOLIO
---
• Simple graphic showing your investment allocation and total balance
• See portfolio performance over time with your customized portfolio chart
• Easily review the value of each investment and its % of your portfolio
• Quickly adjust your portfolio with a tap to buy crypto or sell
• Review transaction history for each investment


---
MARKET OVERVIEW & PRICES
---
• Asset overview pages with price, volume, charts and other details
• Quickly switch between 5 chart time-frames (24 hours up to the entire price history of the asset)
• Concise summary of the project behind each cryptocurrency
• Leaderboard showing top gaining, top losing, most traded, largest market cap
• Create your own custom list to watch your favorite assets and buy straight from the list

---
SIGN UP & FUND
---
• Create, verify and fund a new account right from the app
• Fund with cash (EUR, GBP, USD, CAD, AUD, CHF, and JPY)
• Deposit and withdraw cryptocurrencies
• Buy crypto in seconds with Google Pay

---
DEVICE SECURITY
---
• If your mobile device is lost or stolen, you can revoke its access from your account
• Opening the app requires the same security as opening your device (password or biometric)
• Hide balances from displaying on your device
• Quickly review a list of devices that have accessed the account (make sure it’s only you!)

---
OVER 120 CRYPTOCURRENCIES AVAILABLE
---
We have one of the largest selections of assets to buy and sell, including:

Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Dogecoin (DOGE), Litecoin (LTC), Ripple (XRP), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Monero (XMR), EOS, Cardano (ADA), Polkadot (DOT), TRON (TRX), Stellar (XLM) and many more.

Not investment advice. Crypto trading involves risk of loss.
descriptionShort: Invest with peace of mind using Kraken, a Forbes top-rated crypto exchange.

Kraken - Buy Bitcoin & Crypto
2.15.0

creator: Payward, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Kraken is the easy, safe and secure way to buy crypto such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Dogecoin and more, now available in a simple, on-the-go app for investing and managing your account.

At the forefront of the Bitcoin revolution since 2011, Kraken is one of the largest and oldest Bitcoin exchanges in the world. Millions of clients around the world trust Kraken to sell, swap and buy crypto.

Whether you’re a crypto-beginner or an advanced trader, Kraken gives you the power to chart your own financial course, thanks to our excellent service, handy tools, low fees, versatile funding options and rigorous security standards.


---
CRYPTO INVESTING MADE SIMPLE
---
• Easily buy and sell the most popular cryptocurrencies
• Low fees for buy/sell orders
• Know the exact price before you buy/sell
• 24/7 support with a single tap to open a support ticket
• Multiple payment options to buy crypto including Google Pay


---
EASILY BUY & SELL CRYPTO
---
• Scroll and tap to select the asset to buy/sell
• Preset amounts to create orders in a single tap
• Simple form for custom orders
• Get an exact price quote before you buy or sell
• Review your past transactions
• See your available balance to buy crypto


---
TRACK YOUR CRYPTO PORTFOLIO
---
• Simple graphic showing your investment allocation and total balance
• See portfolio performance over time with your customized portfolio chart
• Easily review the value of each investment and its % of your portfolio
• Quickly adjust your portfolio with a tap to buy crypto or sell
• Review transaction history for each investment


---
MARKET OVERVIEW & PRICES
---
• Asset overview pages with price, volume, charts and other details
• Quickly switch between 5 chart time-frames (24 hours up to the entire price history of the asset)
• Concise summary of the project behind each cryptocurrency
• Leaderboard showing top gaining, top losing, most traded, largest market cap
• Create your own custom list to watch your favorite assets and buy straight from the list

---
SIGN UP & FUND
---
• Create, verify and fund a new account right from the app
• Fund with cash (EUR, GBP, USD, CAD, AUD, CHF, and JPY)
• Deposit and withdraw cryptocurrencies
• Buy crypto in seconds with Google Pay

---
DEVICE SECURITY
---
• If your mobile device is lost or stolen, you can revoke its access from your account
• Opening the app requires the same security as opening your device (password or biometric)
• Hide balances from displaying on your device
• Quickly review a list of devices that have accessed the account (make sure it’s only you!)

---
OVER 120 CRYPTOCURRENCIES AVAILABLE
---
We have one of the largest selections of assets to buy and sell, including:

Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Dogecoin (DOGE), Litecoin (LTC), Ripple (XRP), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Monero (XMR), EOS, Cardano (ADA), Polkadot (DOT), TRON (TRX), Stellar (XLM) and many more.

Not investment advice. Crypto trading involves risk of loss. Cryptocurrency services are provided to US and US territory customers by Payward Ventures Inc. (“PVI”) dba Kraken. View PVI’s disclosures at https://www.kraken.com/legal/disclosures

Geo restrictions may apply. See here for info on Kraken’s undertaking to register in Canada: https://www.securities-administrators.ca/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/20230324-Kraken-PRU-publication-version.pdf

title:
Kraken - Buy Bitcoin & Crypto
2.25.0

creator: Payward, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Kraken is the easy, safe and secure way to buy crypto such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Dogecoin and more, now available in a simple, on-the-go app for investing and managing your account.

At the forefront of the Bitcoin revolution since 2011, Kraken is one of the largest and oldest Bitcoin exchanges in the world. Millions of clients around the world trust Kraken to sell, swap and buy crypto.

Whether you’re a crypto-beginner or an advanced trader, Kraken gives you the power to chart your own financial course, thanks to our excellent service, handy tools, low fees, versatile funding options and rigorous security standards.


---
CRYPTO INVESTING MADE SIMPLE
---
• Easily buy and sell the most popular cryptocurrencies
• Low fees for buy/sell orders
• Know the exact price before you buy/sell
• 24/7 support with a single tap to open a support ticket
• Multiple payment options to buy crypto including Google Pay


---
EASILY BUY & SELL CRYPTO
---
• Scroll and tap to select the asset to buy/sell
• Preset amounts to create orders in a single tap
• Simple form for custom orders
• Get an exact price quote before you buy or sell
• Review your past transactions
• See your available balance to buy crypto
• Buy crypto in fixed amounts over time to benefit from dollar-cost averaging (DCA)


---
TRACK YOUR CRYPTO PORTFOLIO
---
• Simple graphic showing your investment allocation and total balance
• See portfolio performance over time with your customized portfolio chart
• Easily review the value of each investment and its % of your portfolio
• Quickly adjust your portfolio with a tap to buy crypto or sell
• Review transaction history for each investment


---
MARKET OVERVIEW & PRICES
---
• Asset overview pages with price, volume, charts and other details
• Quickly switch between 5 chart time-frames (24 hours up to the entire price history of the asset)
• Concise summary of the project behind each cryptocurrency
• Leaderboard showing top gaining, top losing, most traded, largest market cap
• Create your own custom list to watch your favorite assets and buy straight from the list

---
SIGN UP & FUND
---
• Create, verify and fund a new account right from the app
• Fund with cash (EUR, GBP, USD, CAD, AUD, CHF, and JPY)
• Deposit and withdraw cryptocurrencies
• Buy crypto in seconds with Google Pay

---
DEVICE SECURITY
---
• If your mobile device is lost or stolen, you can revoke its access from your account
• Opening the app requires the same security as opening your device (password or biometric)
• Hide balances from displaying on your device
• Quickly review a list of devices that have accessed the account (make sure it’s only you!)

---
HUNDREDS OF CRYPTOCURRENCIES AVAILABLE
---
We have one of the largest selections of assets to buy and sell, including:

Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Dogecoin (DOGE), Litecoin (LTC), Ripple (XRP), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Monero (XMR), EOS, Cardano (ADA), Polkadot (DOT), TRON (TRX), Stellar (XLM) and many more.

Not investment advice. Crypto trading involves risk of loss. Cryptocurrency services are provided to US and US territory customers by Payward Ventures Inc. (“PVI”) dba Kraken. View PVI’s disclosures at https://www.kraken.com/legal/disclosures

Geo restrictions may apply. See here for info on Kraken’s undertaking to register in Canada: https://www.securities-administrators.ca/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/20230324-Kraken-PRU-publication-version.pdf

title:
Kraken: Trade Bitcoin & Crypto
2.48.0

creator: Payward, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Kraken is the easy, safe and secure way to buy & trade crypto such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Dogecoin and more, now available in a simple, on-the-go app for investing, trading and managing your account.

At the forefront of the Bitcoin revolution since 2011, Kraken is one of the largest and oldest Bitcoin exchanges in the world. Millions of clients around the world trust Kraken to sell, swap and buy crypto.

Whether you’re a crypto-beginner or an advanced trader looking for a new crypto exchange, Kraken gives you the power to chart your own financial course, thanks to our excellent service, handy tools, low fees, versatile funding options and rigorous security standards.

Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. Take 2 mins to learn more at https://www.kraken.com/legal/uk/disclaimer

---
CRYPTO INVESTING & TRADING MADE SIMPLE
---
• Easily buy , sell & trade the most popular cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin & Ethereum)
• Low fees for buy/sell orders
• Know the exact price before you buy/sell
• 24/7 support with a single tap to open a support ticket
• Multiple payment options to buy crypto including Google Pay

---
EASILY BUY, SELL & TRADE CRYPTO
---
• Scroll and tap to select the asset to buy/sell
• Preset amounts to create orders in a single tap
• Simple form for custom orders
• Get an exact price quote before you buy or sell
• Review your past transactions
• See your available balance to buy crypto
• Buy crypto in fixed amounts over time to benefit from dollar-cost averaging (DCA)

---
TRACK YOUR CRYPTO PORTFOLIO
---
• Simple graphic showing your investment allocation and total balance
• See portfolio performance over time with your customized portfolio chart
• Easily review the value of each investment and its % of your portfolio
• Quickly adjust your portfolio with a tap to buy crypto or sell
• Review transaction history for each investment

---
MARKET OVERVIEW & PRICES
---
• Asset overview pages with price, volume, charts and other details
• Quickly switch between 5 chart time-frames (24 hours up to the entire price history of the asset)
• Concise summary of the project behind each cryptocurrency
• Leaderboard showing top gaining, top losing, most traded, largest market cap
• Create your own custom list to watch your favorite assets and buy straight from the list

---
SIGN UP & FUND
---
• Create, verify and fund a new account right from the app
• Fund with cash (EUR, GBP, USD, CAD, AUD, CHF, and JPY)
• Deposit and withdraw cryptocurrencies
• Buy crypto, Bitcoin & Ethereum in seconds with Google Pay

---
DEVICE SECURITY
---
• If your mobile device is lost or stolen, you can revoke its access from your account
• Opening the app requires the same security as opening your device (password or biometric)
• Hide balances from displaying on your device
• Quickly review a list of devices that have accessed the account (make sure it’s only you!)

---
HUNDREDS OF CRYPTOCURRENCIES AVAILABLE
---
We have one of the largest selections of assets to buy and sell, including:

Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Dogecoin (DOGE), Litecoin (LTC), Ripple (XRP), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Monero (XMR), EOS, Cardano (ADA), Polkadot (DOT), TRON (TRX), Stellar (XLM) and many more.

Cryptocurrencies are unregulated in the UK, profits may be subject to capital gains tax, and the value of cryptocurrencies can go down or up.

title:
Kraken: Trade Bitcoin & Crypto
3.8.2

creator: Payward, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Kraken is the easy, safe and secure way to buy & trade crypto such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Dogecoin and more, now available in a simple, on-the-go app for investing, trading and managing your account.

At the forefront of the Bitcoin revolution since 2011, Kraken is one of the largest and oldest Bitcoin exchanges in the world. Millions of clients around the world trust Kraken to sell, swap and buy crypto.

Whether you’re a crypto-beginner or an advanced trader looking for a new crypto exchange, Kraken gives you the power to chart your own financial course, thanks to our excellent service, handy tools, low fees, versatile funding options and rigorous security standards.

Don’t invest unless you’re prepared to lose all the money you invest. This is a high-risk investment and you should not expect to be protected if something goes wrong. Take 2 mins to learn more at https://www.kraken.com/legal/uk/disclaimer

---
CRYPTO INVESTING & TRADING MADE SIMPLE
---
• Easily buy , sell & trade the most popular cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin & Ethereum)
• Low fees for buy/sell orders
• Know the exact price before you buy/sell
• 24/7 support with a single tap to open a support ticket
• Multiple payment options to buy crypto including Google Pay

---
EASILY BUY, SELL & TRADE CRYPTO
---
• Scroll and tap to select the asset to buy/sell
• Preset amounts to create orders in a single tap
• Simple form for custom orders
• Get an exact price quote before you buy or sell
• Review your past transactions
• See your available balance to buy crypto
• Buy crypto in fixed amounts over time to benefit from dollar-cost averaging (DCA)

---
TRACK YOUR CRYPTO PORTFOLIO
---
• Simple graphic showing your investment allocation and total balance
• See portfolio performance over time with your customized portfolio chart
• Easily review the value of each investment and its % of your portfolio
• Quickly adjust your portfolio with a tap to buy crypto or sell
• Review transaction history for each investment

---
MARKET OVERVIEW & PRICES
---
• Asset overview pages with price, volume, charts and other details
• Quickly switch between 5 chart time-frames (24 hours up to the entire price history of the asset)
• Concise summary of the project behind each cryptocurrency
• Leaderboard showing top gaining, top losing, most traded, largest market cap
• Create your own custom list to watch your favorite assets and buy straight from the list

---
PAY USING YOUR CRYPTO
---
• Send money fast to any Kraken user, anywhere
• Zero fees for all payments, worldwide
• 300+ different currencies to choose from (government and crypto)
• Claim your unique @Kraktag

---
SIGN UP & FUND
---
• Create, verify and fund a new account right from the app
• Fund with cash (EUR, GBP, USD, CAD, AUD, CHF, and JPY)
• Deposit and withdraw cryptocurrencies
• Buy crypto, Bitcoin & Ethereum in seconds with Google Pay

---
DEVICE SECURITY
---
• If your mobile device is lost or stolen, you can revoke its access from your account
• Opening the app requires the same security as opening your device (password or biometric)
• Hide balances from displaying on your device
• Quickly review a list of devices that have accessed the account (make sure it’s only you!)

Cryptocurrencies are unregulated in the UK, profits may be subject to capital gains tax, and the value of cryptocurrencies can go down or up.
